title: Mongolian Beef
directions: Combine 1 tsp Oil, 1 tsp soy sauce, 1Tbs corn starch. Add Beef and let sit for 1 hour
Dredge marinated beef in the remaining Â¼ cup of corn starch
Heat 1/3 cup of oil in wok on high heat
Before oils starts to smoke add beef. Cook 1 min and turn. Cook for 30 seconds.
Remove beef and drain all the oil except 1 Tbs
Turn heat to medium-High. Add ginger and dried chili peppers. After 15 seconds add garlic. Stir for 10 seconds. Add soy sauce, chicken broth, and brown sugar. Let simmer 2 min
Add corn starch slurry to thicken
Add beef and scallions of 30 seconds
ingredients: 2 Tbs cornstarch mixed with 2 Tbs water
4 Scallions cut 1 inch on a diagonal
